name: LostColoniesLarpNews

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Learn about the latest happenings at the Lost Colonies Larp, a Live Action Role Play community serving the DC, Maryland and Virginia areas. Check out https://lostcolonieslarp.com for more information
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
